meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Cary Finkelstein Megan Mills Laurie MacDougall Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7328.

td.p: Cary Finkelstein, an attorney from Los Angeles, California
Megan Mills, a teacher from Fairfax, Virginia
Laurie MacDougall, a cancer registrar originally from Medford, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,700)

tr.td: ART TERMS
A MAJOR LEAGUER IN THE SONG
(Alex: You have to fill in a single team player for us.)
ENGLISH USAGE
-OLOGIES
MILAN
OUT OF FASHION WEEK
(Alex: Not in fashion.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The west side of the Berlin Wall was a fine place for this type of art that gets its name from the Latin for "wall"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The west side of the Berlin Wall was a fine place for this type of art that gets its name from the Latin for "wall"

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
